description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nOf Fate Unwritten:
After this creature {ACTION_attacks}, it deals damage to a different enemy for each {RACE_Mythicant} creature fighting on your side. This creature's attacks ignore 10% of enemies' {STAT_defense} (up to 50%) for each {RACE_Mythicant} creature fighting on your side.
name: Einherjar Tale
